4 tree branches outside SoR.notes: Do not pick up any food until steak

.!!(SAVE THE GAME).notes: Do .!!(NOT) manually save until after dupe is complete. .link([Why not?]https://pastebin.com/MN1c2gAR)

1 Flint?.notes: For campfire; see below for backup if you get none

2 Endura Shroom.notes: Will be duped to 8 stamina food

_Material<Hearty Durians,10>.notes: Not scrap. Use for food until dupe; save 1 for quest.

_Shrine::MoggLatan.notes: Land at monk. Glide back to chest. Void out.

_Equipment::Bow<Royal Bow>.notes: (Optional) Need a 4th bow. Can grab this one or a Spiked Boko Bow later.

Kill 1-3 .enemy(Stalkers).notes: Can skip gears. Getting more than these counts will make duping more difficult. If you don't get enough screws, it's fine. Can pick up a core.

_Shrine::KayaWan.notes: Could pick up a missing screw here

_Shrine::DakaTuss.notes: Eat the steak here. Important to have 0 food before glitch.

_Material<Energetic Rhino Beetle,1>.notes: Spawns between 9:00pm and 7:00am. Make morning if needed.

_Material<Flint>.notes: (Optional) If you got flint in mushroom woods, skip this.

_Chest<5 Shock Arrow>.notes: (Optional) Get this one or the one in Hyrule Castle

_Tod::Morning.notes: Create an infinite campfire with wood, flint, and torch

Kill .enemy(Black Lizalfos).notes: Equip FDB, kill with 3 shock arrow headshots.

_Equipment::Bow<Spiked Boko Bow>.notes: Optimal 4th bow to grab. Skip if you already have Royal Bow. .!!(DO NOT PICK UP FIRE ARROWS.)

.item(2 Lizalfos Talon).notes: Kill the green or blue lizalfos if missing a horn or talon.

Drop Hammer.notes: Make sure you have 2 weapons, 4 bows, 1 shield. .link([Check inventory]https://github.com/taoplusplus/granatus.theglitch/blob/main/shopping-list.txt).

.!!(Get Slate, Bombs+, Stasis+).notes: If less than 3 screws, upgrade slate in Hateno 2.

_Npc::SheikaMale<Olkin>.notes: Goes to northern campfire at 5:00PM; starts running around the village at 8:00PM

Kill bokos.notes: With bomb arrow if not raining, ancient arrows if it is raining

.!!(Revali's Gale).notes: If it's after 4:00AM (?), grab the cold darner next to you on the landing

.dir(E) + midair.notes: Wait until Riju's question, then choose "Keep up the fight!" Use minimap to find Naboris.

_Npc<Maypin>.notes: If Maypin doesn't show up, buy 1 warm darner and 1 winterwing butterfly from Beedle. Then get 1 cold darner in Rito later.

_Tod::Noon.notes: Goal is to reach Suma Sahma between 4:00pm and 5:30pm. If you're missing the window, make noon later in this segment.

Begin Naydra sequence.notes: Shoot an eye before each of the following three koroks (N24, N31, N39)

_Korok::N30.notes: Stasis apple and bomb arrow from a distance

_Tod::Morning.notes: If between 12:00pm and 5:00am, need to make morning twice to properly advance a day so Naydra spawns

_Equipment::Bow<Knight's Bow>.notes: (Optional) Metal bow for Eldin. May need to drop 1 GEB to pick up.

_Discover<Luto's Crossing>.notes: Should discover as you fly past

.gale().notes: Use 2 WBs to get to terminal 1. Use gale after terminal 5 to get to boss room.

.boss(Waterblight).notes: Stasis+ 6 head shots, no attack up

_Npc::ZoraMale<Fronk>.notes: 7:00am to 8:00pm, .link([Fronk is at the pillar]https://youtu.be/gQH8hwsckaM?t=13565). Otherwise he is .link([at the pools]https://youtu.be/3EltLt0dpks?t=2686).

_Npc::ZoraMale<Gruve>.notes: Quest reward is 5 Fleet-Lotus Seed, will use for transmute.

_Snap::Quest<Guardian Stalker>.notes: As one of the stalkers is dying

.!!(Unequip bomb arrows).notes: Windbombs do not work on the first tick of burn damage. Equip metal shield and bow (if you have one) or just don't let GEB burn up (30s) timer.

_Npc::Goron<Greyson>.notes: Make night if needed to speak to him

_Discover<Stolock Bridge>.notes: Do not land with bow burning or you'll lose it in the cutscene

_Korok::E06.notes: Rare ore deposit here for amber if still needed

_Boss::Talus::Igneo.notes: Igneo taluses have the best chance to drop flint for Jewel Trade. Collect drops here and with remaining three until 11 flint.

Take the minecart out.notes: Stasis the minecart once you have a good windbomb angle

_Tod::Morning.notes: To spawn Dinraal. If it's between 12:00am and 5:00am, make morning twice to properly advance a day.

Get .item(Lynel Hoof).notes: Hoof is for Riddles of Hyrule. High chance of getting one, but if you don't, see below for backup.

Kill .enemy(White-Maned Lynel).notes: (Optional) Only if previous lynel didn't drop hoof.

_Shrine::GoraeTorr.notes: WB E and then midair W.

Look .!!(East in the sky).notes: For Salvager chest. Watch it land.

_Tod::Night.notes: For Stalnox, Death Mountain's Secret, and blood moon

.boss(Fireblight).notes: Stasis+ 5 headshots, wearing +1 attack and +2 flame armor

_Discover<Lost Woods>.notes: BLSS should pass through this location

_Npc<Tasho>.notes: Move forward until you hear Oaki's dialogue to trigger the escort. Don't need to follow Oaki; he'll move along his path while we do the next steps.

_Npc<Walton>.notes: Apple, pumpkin, sunshroom, voltfin, lynel hoof

Activate .loc(Keo Ruug).notes: .!!(DON'T) enter shrine or Oaki will reset

3 Bird Egg.notes: In trees behind Hestu. 1 for korok in castle and 2 for transmute scrap.

_Npc<Hestu>.notes: 3 bow, 7 weapon, 4 shield. The shield slots don't really matter; can get them at the end.

10 Restless Cricket.notes: Spin attack grass to collect during escort

_Equipment::Shield<Rusty Shield>.notes: Keep the shield for a korok later

.dir(S) midairs.notes: .link([Easier movement without midairs]https://twitter.com/TaoPlusPlus/status/1525684201256787968?s=20&t=B-BWPy4MWcQnNr5kUJ9Tkg). Can also warp to Eldin Tower and BLSS (remember to equip metal bow).

Skip cutscenes and continue.notes: Close software and re-open if inventory glitch is still active.

_Tod::Night.notes: Cancels blood moon by forcing it to occur while you're in Hyrule Castle

Hyrule Castle: Take bows from lizalfos until full

_Equipment::Weapon<Great Flameblade>.notes: This and the Thunderblade are high durability weapons for tree chopping

_Korok::X01.notes: If you lift the rock right before the guardian laser hits you, you won't take damage.

Hyrule Castle: Hit switch to turn on updraft

_Material<Acorn,18>.notes: Each big tree has 6 acorns. Use stasis to see them.

_Shrine::MijahRokee.notes: If you missed the blood moon, continue with the route and warp back. You'll get 3-4 blood moons in the run.

_Material<Acorn,3>.notes: Need to pick up 8 more rng acorns during the run

_Tod::Noon.notes: For Sasa Kai timing. Can make noon later in this segment for more margin of error.

_Boss::Talus::Luminous.notes: Stand on pillar with cube for G21

_Korok::W03.notes: Want to have 3 Mighty Banana at the end

_Npc::Gerudo<Malena>.notes: 2:00pm to 10:00pm; before 2:00pm she's in the training yard

Desert Complete: Out, down street on the right

_Tod::Night.notes: For Salvager chest when you get to Bridge of Hylia

_Shrine::YaNaga.notes: If raining, make night until it's not for D54

Look .!!(Southeast in the sky).notes: For Salvager chest. Watch it land.

.dir(N) ride horse.notes: Sets up the horse for easy pickup later

_Korok::L65.notes: Do not whistle sprint until after Shoqa Tatone

_Tod::Night.notes: For the Stalnoxes coming up (if needed)

_Equipment::Weapon<Traveler's Sword>.notes: Need to get here before 5:00am. Backup in Kakariko later.

_Npc<Rozel>.notes: Inside house under F44 if raining. Sunken Treasure.

Shoot letter.notes: When you return to Finley, the letter will respawn on land

_Tod::Noon.notes: For Ballon Flight and Stalnox timing

_Npc<Shamae>.notes: Get here before 8:00pm. Make noon if needed.

_Shrine::MirroShaz.notes: Stalnox coming up. Make night if needed.

_Discover<Rauru Settlement Ruins>.notes: With superlaunch, can get this location while gilding through on the way to Helmhead Bridge

_Korok::T16.notes: Pick up a pepper and pause/unpause to set menu for T09

Start T06 race.notes: If you make a mistake, you can finish T06 right after H60. Then do T08 to T07.

_Npc<Jana>.notes: Get here before 8:00pm. Make noon if needed.

_Korok::N54.notes: Palm fruit on nearby tree if needed

_Boss::Hinox::Blue.notes: Smuggle an arrow by shooting with a single shot bow.

_Equipment::Weapon<Traveler's Sword>.notes: Backup if you missed at Shee Vaneer

_Npc<Koko>.notes: Swift carrot, goat butter, raw meat, courser bee honey

Collect fireflies.notes: If you miss some and scare the rest away, you can respawn them by warping to Taloh Naeg

Kill .enemy(Yiga Blademaster).notes: 2 headshots with GEB and normal arrows will make the blademaster drop his weapon

_Npc<Calip>.notes: Can cancel dialogue immediately, quest will still complete

_Npc<Clavia>.notes: (Optional) If you didn't talk to her during The Glitch

Activate .!!(Pedestial).notes: Either (1) run + shield hop + spam X OR (2) WB and land with glider open.

_Tod::Night.notes: (Optional) For Salvager chest. Make night if here after 2:30am.

Look .!!(Southeast in the sky).notes: For Salvager chest. Watch it land.

.dir(<S).notes: Pick up/put down rock and stand on it to WB.

.!!(Upgrade all armor).notes: Set of the Wild, Zora Set, Champion's Tunic

_Npc<Hudson>.notes: Talk to him again after the wedding
